instructors.name: Pavan Shankar
instructors.title: Jr Moodle Administrator
instructors.description: 12 months of experience as a Junior Moodle Administrator and Course Designer. Supports Moodle site administration, course setup, content structuring, and basic faculty assistance for effective online learning delivery.

instructors.name: Priya Sharma
instructors.title: Moodle Instructional Designer
instructors.description: 12+ years in curriculum development and instructional design. Expert in creating engaging interactive content and assessment strategies for Moodle platforms. Certified Moodle Instructor.

instructors.name: Amit Patel
instructors.title: Moodle Technical Trainer
instructors.description: 10+ years of hands-on experience with Moodle administration and customization. Specializes in technical training, plugin integration, and system troubleshooting. Certified Moodle Instructor.

instructors.name: Sneha Desai
instructors.title: Learning Experience Designer
instructors.description: 8+ years creating transformative learning experiences using Moodle. Expert in adaptive learning, gamification, and student engagement strategies. Certified Moodle Instructor.
